players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "That is a lie! I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. Diana, you must vote with me."
Charlie: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and she is mafioso. Diana, your vote decides the game. Trust me."
You: "Charlie is lying. I am the real detective and he is mafioso. Diana, your vote decides everything. Trust my investigation, not his word."
